issue.title: [Rust] Update unsafe guidelines for adding JIRA references
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10985](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10985). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should document known soundness issues in Jira issues and reference them from the source code.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10985?focusedCommentId=17252476) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8969
